metadata.title: 2002 (Jun. -Jul.) U.S. Echo Integration-trawl Survey Data for Walleye Pollock (Theragra chalcogramma) on the Bering Sea Shelf and Slope (Cruise ID: MF0002-08)
metadata.description: To collect echo integration and trawl data to estimate midwater pollock abundance and distribution.
metadata.notes:
